column4: hey what command do i use if i want to start autorun.exe in terminal with wine??
wine autorun.exe, just like the help says
it says Wine: cannot find autorun.exe
then move to the directory it's in
so move to the directory on the CD
when i type cd cdrom0 it says no such file or directory
when im in the cd directory and i run wine setup.exe it will start but at the end it stops and i get: "fixme:msi:ACTION_PerformUIAction UNHANDLED MSI ACTION L'Fatal_Error'" what should I do?
I'm pretty sure you need cedega for that
i have Cedega-4.2.1-DEB.3282285.TPB and there is 3 files in there. They are: control.tar.gz, data.tar.gz, and debian-binary
didn't they give you instructions when you bought it?
i didnt buy it i got it off of www.thepiratebay.org
chill dude
why?
and it's in ubuntu
im trying to compile wine
wine is in ubuntu, too
no config file is ever going to be in there
where is it gonna be then?
